recommendations.title: Improve meta descriptions
recommendations.description: Fix meta description issues on 1 pages. Ensure descriptions are 120-160 characters and compelling.
recommendations.detailed_reason:
Meta descriptions provide search engines with a summary of your page content. While not a direct ranking factor, well-written meta descriptions improve click-through rates from search results pages. Issues found on the following pages:
- https://happy-skin.com: Meta description too long

recommendations.title: Add missing alt text
recommendations.description: Add alt text to images on 1 pages for better accessibility and SEO.
recommendations.detailed_reason:
Alt text helps search engines understand image content, provides context when images can't load, and is essential for accessibility for visually impaired users. Google uses alt text as a ranking factor for image searches. Issues found on the following pages:
- https://happy-skin.com: Missing alt text on 6 images

recommendations.title: Improve content-to-HTML ratio
recommendations.description: Clean up HTML code on 2 pages to improve the text-to-code ratio.
recommendations.detailed_reason:
Content-to-HTML ratio indicates the proportion of actual content versus HTML code on your pages. A low ratio (under 10%) may suggest code bloat that can slow down page loading and negatively impact SEO. Search engines prioritize content-rich pages. Issues found on the following pages:
- https://happy-skin.com/cookie-policy/: Content-to-HTML ratio of 4.99%
- https://happy-skin.com: Content-to-HTML ratio of 6.56%

recommendations.title: Improve mobile-friendliness
recommendations.description: Optimize 4 pages for mobile devices by adding proper viewport tags and responsive design.
recommendations.detailed_reason:
With Google's mobile-first indexing, mobile-friendliness is crucial for ranking. Mobile users now account for more than half of all web traffic. Pages without viewport meta tags or proper mobile optimization will lose search visibility and user engagement. Issues found on the following pages:
- https://happy-skin.com/cookie-policy/: No 'Vary: User-Agent' header found
- https://happy-skin.com/terms-conditions/: No 'Vary: User-Agent' header found
- https://happy-skin.com: No 'Vary: User-Agent' header found
... and more
